weekly_top_story.headline: HHS Looks to Crack Down on Healthcare Information Blocking
weekly_top_story.summary: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services announced plans to intensify enforcement against healthcare information blocking, a move aimed at enhancing interoperability and patient access to their health data, which could significantly affect healthcare delivery and compliance.

stories.headline: SCAN Health Plan to Expand Medicare Advantage Footprint into Washington for 2026
stories.summary: SCAN Health Plan announced plans to expand its Medicare Advantage offerings into Washington state starting in 2026, reflecting ongoing growth in the Medicare Advantage market and impacting healthcare providers and beneficiaries.

stories.headline: HHS Intensifies Crackdown on Healthcare Information Blocking
stories.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services is increasing regulatory actions against healthcare entities that impede the flow of electronic health information, reinforcing interoperability to empower patient access and continuity of care.
